How can I select a value from a drop-down menu using Selenium in Python? 

For example, I want to select an option from the following HTML drop-down menu:

```html
<select id="fruits01" class="select" name="fruits">
  <option value="0">Choose your fruits:</option>
  <option value="1">Banana</option>
  <option value="2">Mango</option>
</select>
```

Initially, I click on the drop-down menu using the following code:

```python
inputElementFruits = driver.find_element_by_xpath("//select[id='fruits']").click()
```

After clicking, I need to select a specific option, let's say "Mango". I tried using `inputElementFruits.send_keys(...)`, but it didn't work. How can I select the desired option?

To select a value from a drop-down menu using Selenium in Python, you can use the `Select` class provided by Selenium's `webdriver.support.ui` module. This class provides an easy way to interact with `<select>` elements and choose options.

Here's how you can select the "Mango" option from your drop-down menu:

1. First, import the necessary class.
2. Locate the drop-down menu using an appropriate locator (like its `id`, `name`, or `xpath`).
3. Use the `Select` class to interact with the drop-down menu and select the desired option.

Here's the complete code example:

```python
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.support.ui import Select

# Initialize the WebDriver (make sure to specify the path to the driver)
driver = webdriver.Chrome(executable_path='path/to/chromedriver')

# Open the webpage with the drop-down menu
driver.get('url_of_your_webpage')

# Locate the drop-down menu by its id
dropdown = driver.find_element_by_id('fruits01')

# Create a Select object with the drop-down menu element
select = Select(dropdown)

# Select the option with the visible text "Mango"
select.select_by_visible_text('Mango')

# Alternatively, you can select by value
# select.select_by_value('2')

# Close the driver
driver.quit()
```

Make sure to replace `'url_of_your_webpage'` and `'path/to/chromedriver'` with the actual URL of the webpage and the path to your ChromeDriver executable, respectively.

This code will interact with the drop-down and select the "Mango" option either by its visible text or by its value.
